title: Add command to view generated epic context document
description:
Provide an easy way to view the generated context document for an epic. This could be:
- A TUI command/keybind to show the context in a pager
- A CLI command like 'ticker context <epic-id>' to display it
- Save context to a file in .ticker/ that can be viewed

This helps users understand what context the agent sees and debug issues.

Acceptance criteria:
- Easy way to view context document
- Shows full context content
- Works both during and after ticker run
